@graph.name: mTranslator
@graph.description: mTranslator is an intelligent translation platform powered by advanced large language models (LLM), designed to break down language barriers and facilitate seamless global communication. mTranslator supports multiple translation scenarios: one‑click webpage translation, real‑time subtitle translation, input‑field translation, and document translation in various formats.
